Package org.apache.juneau.swaps

Class InputStreamSwap

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.swap.ObjectSwap<T,​java.lang.String>
org.apache.juneau.swap.StringSwap<java.io.InputStream>
org.apache.juneau.swaps.InputStreamSwap
Direct Known Subclasses:
InputStreamSwap.Base64, InputStreamSwap.Hex, InputStreamSwap.SpacedHex
public abstract class InputStreamSwap
extends StringSwap<java.io.InputStream>
Transforms InputStreams to Strings.

  • Method Details

    • toBytes

      protected byte[] toBytes​(java.io.InputStream is) throws java.io.IOException
      Convert the specified input stream to a byte array.
      Parameters:
      is - The input stream to convert to bytes.
      Can be null.
      The stream is automatically closed.
      Returns:
      The byte array.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Thrown by input stream.

    • toStream

      protected java.io.InputStream toStream​(byte[] b, ClassMeta<?> hint)
      Convert the specified byte array into an input stream.
      Parameters:
      b - The byte array.
      hint - Contains a hint about what subtype is being requested.
      Returns:
      The byte array.
